root.cn: 这是一款平板上的拼图游戏！开心拼图乐HD为全年龄段拼图爱好者带来无以伦比的拼图解谜体验。 独特的设计实现了每一块拼块都与众不同，让你体验迄今最富挑战性的拼图游戏。 这是我们都熟悉并喜爱的解决难题的愉悦感受！ *** 特性 *** - 智能设计:每块拼块都有着独特的形状 - 精美简易: 自然的游戏界面，简单且易于上手 - 自定义块数: 拼块数量从 4 块到 144 块 - 数百幅图片:按主题分组的图片包括动物,建筑,汽车,城市,花卉,家居,风景,海洋等。
root.en: Play your favorite jigsaw puzzle in your trip! Happy jigsaw puzzle HD provides an unparalleled puzzle puzzle experience for all age jigsaw lovers. The unique design enables each block to be unique, allowing you to experience the most challenging jigsaw puzzle so far. This is a pleasant feeling that we are all familiar with and love to solve difficult problems. * * * * character * * * * * - Intelligent Design: Each piece has a unique shape Elegant and simple: the natural game interface is simple and easy to use. - Custom Block Number: Block Number ranges from 4 to 144 Hundreds of pictures: images grouped by themes include animals, buildings, cars, cities, flowers, homes, landscapes, oceans, etc.
